progetto.view.gui

Class PreGamePaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractController
      • progetto.view.gui.PreGamePaneController

  • public class PreGamePaneController
extends AbstractController
    this is the class that handles the pre game fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica

      void onPreShow()
      called every time this pane is shown clear selected items
      private void onSitButtonPressed()
      called when sitButton is clicked pick the selected chair
      private void onStartGameButtonClicked()
      called when startGameButton is clicked send a StartGameAction to the controller

      set up this object, it is equivalent to a constructor since there is no access to it
      private void updateMainBoard()
      called when main board changes update the possible options, which are different if there will be a single or a multi player game
      private void updateRoomView()
      update when the current room changes
